name: 李穎玟
objective:
It is the follow-up course of laser engineering. It further discusses the principles, engineering techniques and related industrial applications of advanced high-power fiber laser systems. The main contents are listed below:
1. Overview of laser basic theory
2. Fiber optics
3. Rare-earth doped gain fiber and fiber based high-power devices
4. High-power fiber laser systems
5. Q-switched fiber laser systems
6. Mode-locked fiber laser systems
7. Fiber laser MOPA
8. Fiber laser sources in micro-machining
9. Fiber pigtailed diode laser in industry applications
schedule:
About two weeks for each topic.
